record.title: DISPENSING WITH CALENDAR WEDNESDAY BUSINESS ON WEDNESDAY NEXT
record.narrative:
DISPENSING WITH CALENDAR WEDNESDAY BUSINESS ON WEDNESDAY NEXT -- (House of Representatives - June 20, 2008)

[Page: H5776]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the business in order under the Calendar Wednesday rule be dispensed with on Wednesday next.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Maryland?
